desc
It's good to be the king. Includes: Head Piece, Torso With Armlets, Legs, Jewelry and Sandals for a total of 5 pieces! [#Legal]
Quel plaisir d'être le roi! Ce pack comprend 5 accessoires: une coiffe, un haut avec brassards, un bas, des bijoux et des sandales! [#Legal]
Wer wäre nicht gerne König? Enthält: Kopfbedeckung, Oberkörper mit Armmanschetten, Rock, Schmuck und Sandalen. Ein fünfteiliges Set also![#Legal]
È bello essere il re. Include: copricapo, tunica e bracciali, gonna, gioielli e sandali per un totale di 5 pezzi! [#Legal]
¡Está bien ser rey! Incluye tocado, peto con brazales, falda, joyas y sandalias, ¡un total de 5 piezas! [#Legal]
It's good to be the king. Includes: Head Piece, Torso With Armlets, Legs, Jewelry and Sandals for a total of 5 pieces! [#Legal]
